name: Sunrise Pergola Pool Deck Plan – 16x16 Deck with 8ft Pool Cutout + Full-Size Pergola
open_features: 8 ft circular pool cutout (pool designed separately by others)
4×4 posts (SP No.2) on 12×12×12 in concrete footings
6×6 posts (SP No.2) on 18×18×12 in concrete footings for pergola
Joists: 2×4 SP No.2 @ 12 in O.C. with Simpson H1A hurricane ties
2×12 stair stringers @ 12 in O.C.; stair footing 24×48×4 in depth
Railing: 4×4 posts @ 4 ft O.C.; 2×4 rails with 2×2 pickets ≤4 in gap
Decking: 2×6 composite decking; 1/8 in gap after drying
Pergola: 2×8 beams, 2×8 rafters @16 in O.C., 4×2 battens @16 in O.C.
Pergola beam-to-column connections with Simpson LPC4Z + thru-bolts
safety_note: This plan illustrates only the deck framing and pergola around a pool cutout. The pool, electrical bonding, fencing, alarms, and anti-entrapment systems must be provided by licensed contractors per local code.
